xwikidoc.title: Translations in JS
xwikidoc.content:
## Keys in this page are passed to JavaScript with the script in WebIDECode.JSTranslations webide.js.panel.advanced=Advanced fields webide.js.panel.related=Related elements webide.js.panel.shortcuts=Shortcuts webide.js.shortcuts=

Syntax highlighting editor

Ctrl+F : Search
Ctrl+G : Find next
Ctrl+Shift+G : Find previous
Alt+F : Persistent Search

Web IDE

Alt+S : Save and view
Alt+Shift+S : Save and continue
Alt+C : View current page
Alt+Shift+C : View current page (new tab)
##Hierarchy webide.js.hierarchy.reloading=Reloading the menu... webide.js.hierarchy.renaming=Renaming in progress... webide.js.hierarchy.renamed=Renaming performed webide.js.hierarchy.folder.removing=Removing space... webide.js.hierarchy.folder.removed=Space removed from project webide.js.hierarchy.folder.notFound=Space not found in the list of spaces in this project. webide.js.hierarchy.folder.adding=Adding space... webide.js.hierarchy.folder.added=Space added webide.js.hierarchy.page.removing=Removing page... webide.js.hierarchy.page.removed=Page removed from project webide.js.hierarchy.page.adding=Adding page... webide.js.hierarchy.page.added=Page added ##Commons (all editors) webide.js.commons.deleting=Deleting... webide.js.commons.deleted=Deleted webide.js.commons.removed=Removed webide.js.commons.deleteAction=Delete webide.js.commons.add=Add webide.js.commons.error=Error webide.js.commons.modalError=ERROR : You have to fill all the fields! ##Wiki editor webide.js.wiki.title=Title webide.js.wiki.content=Content webide.js.wiki.parent=Parent webide.js.wiki.hidden=Hidden document webide.js.wiki.modalAddLanguage=Add new language webide.js.wiki.modalAddPage=Add new page webide.js.wiki.nameUsedError=ERROR : Name already used! webide.js.wiki.relatedElmtError=Unable to load related elements ##Object editor webide.js.objects.quickAccess=Quick access webide.js.objects.macroAddParam=Add a parameter webide.js.objects.expand=Expand all webide.js.objects.collapse=Collapse all webide.js.objects.loadError=Error while loading object webide.js.objects.js=JS webide.js.objects.css=CSS webide.js.objects.macro=Macro webide.js.objects.panel=Panel webide.js.objects.sheet=Sheet webide.js.objects.translation=Translation webide.js.objects.uix=UI Extension webide.js.objects.loadUnable=Unable to add object: webide.js.objects.deleting=Deleting object... webide.js.objects.removing=Removing from page... webide.js.objects.updatingToken=Updating CSRF token... webide.js.objects.updatedToken=CSRF token updated! webide.js.objects.errorToken=Token already up-to-date ##Class editor webide.js.classes.switchAdvanced=Switch to advanced editor webide.js.classes.switchBasic=Switch to basic editor ##Core module (WebIDE) webide.js.core.unsavedContent=You have unsaved content! Are you sure you want to close the page? webide.js.core.savingAll=Saving all tabs... webide.js.core.alreadySavedAll=All tabs are already saved! webide.js.core.savedAll=All tabs are saved! webide.js.core.saveAllError=Tabs saved. Error while saving: webide.js.core.saveAllTemp=tabs done... webide.js.core.saveAllButton=Save all ##States pop-up webide.js.states.loaded=Loaded webide.js.states.loadingError=Error while loading webide.js.states.saved=Saved
